name: householdjs
description: styled layout components made out of household members
author: Daniel Zeman <ledaniel.zeman@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsc
scripts.clean: npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:tsbuildinfo && npm run clean:docs
scripts.docs: npm run clean:docs & npm run docs:generate
scripts.docs:generate: typedoc --out docs/ src/ --mode file --readme none --theme minimal
